articles.author: Eric Henderson
articles.title: Looking for the best places to see the April 8 solar eclipse in the totality path? You may have to dodge clouds. - CBS News
articles.description: The total solar eclipse will be visible along a 2,500-mile path, but Americans looking for the best location to see the eclipse may have to contend with April showers. Here's a region-by-region view of which places have the best weather odds.
articles.content: America is gearing up for the April 8 total solar eclipse, and many are checking maps to find the best location to watch within the path of totality. But those hoping to view the corona and see a ful… [+11015 chars]

articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Tillu Square debuts better than Crew at North America box office with $1.8 million haul - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire roars to an $80 million box office opening in North America. Crew became one of the biggest Hindi openers this year. | Bollywood
articles.content: For the first time this year, two Indian movies found spots in the top 10 ranking of the week's biggest movies at the North America box office. Telugu film Tillu Square stood on number 8 spot while H… [+4604 chars]

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: ‘Venus Eclipse’ Opens For ‘Great North American Eclipse:’ The Sky This Week - Forbes
articles.description: Each Monday, I pick out North America’s celestial highlights for the week ahead—and this week there's an occultation of Venus as the moon wanes towards a total solar eclipse next week.
articles.content: The crescent moon and Venus are pictured in Bangkok on March 24, 2023, following a lunar occultation ... [+] of the second planet from the sun. (Photo by Jack TAYLOR / AFP) (Photo by JACK TAYLOR/AFP … [+5586 chars]
